result.name: Linkage Disequilibrium and Population Structure in Wild and Cultivated Populations of Rubber Tree (Hevea brasiliensis)
result.description: Markers based in genotyping by sequencing were used to perform a genetic map with 252 progenies in rubber tree and, based on these markers, the population structure and linkage disequilibrium were determined in germplasm.
result.center: Center of Molecular Biology and Genetic Engineering (CBMEG), UNICAMP
